channel.title: Plugins on OpenAssistive - Open source Assistive Technology Solutions
channel.description: Recent content in Plugins on OpenAssistive - Open source Assistive Technology Solutions

item.title: Some new project
item.description:
This simple program lets you explore the DMOZ web directory, a catalogue of good websites. NOTE: Accessible Web Directory is now included in the WebbIE3 installation.

This simple program lets you explore the DMOZ web directory, a catalogue of good websites. It’s an alternative way to find web pages of interest. Simply explore categories of web pages and when you find one you like in the catalogue Accessible Web Directory will open it in your default web browser.

Links:

  • Help
  • Project Home Page

Download: http://www.webbie.org.uk/accessiblewebdirectory/index.htm
